title: Revlio To Power FLIBS, the Largest in Water Boat Show on Earth
text:
The Fort Lauderdale-based company to launch its unique marketing technology to the marine industry.
Fort Lauderdale, FL (PRWEB) October 08, 2015
Mobile shopping platform, Revlio has partnered with the 56th Annual Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show , that will take place November 5-9th. Over 1000 vendors will be in attendance displaying a variety of marine vessels, products, services, and accessories. Revlio’s unique technology will allow exhibitors to communicate with potential customers in a way that has never been possible. Revlio will play a fundamental role for them in generating real-time leads and closing sales.
Through the use of hash codes and SMS messaging, booth displays and marketing materials will be instantly shoppable. Vendors can then directly connect to customers who will be provided with more information - instantly. Customers will also have the option to opt-in for company updates via text or, for serious buyers, a phone call. About 99% of Revlio messages are delivered and opened in 18 minutes or less, making Revlio the highest ROI of any communication channel.
Revlio was founded by Todd Weider, a seasoned entrepreneur and visionary who built and operated large yachts for 14 years. His experience in the marine industry drives his passion for innovating it. The 56th Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show will give Weider the opportunity to debut his new marketing technology to the industry he loves.
“Knowing that we have been able to create game changing technology for attendees and exhibitors is an amazing feeling,” explained Weider. “Revlio is introducing something truly leading-edge, and we cannot wait to begin working with tradeshows around the country to bring them a simple solution that streamlines the experience and sales process in a way never seen before.”
FLIBS attendees can instantly engage with show organizers through their mobile devices by texting the code “FLIBS15” to 55778, attendees will begin receiving updates including reminders about special events, seminars, discounts on tickets, specials in the cocktail bars, parking, and much more.
ABOUT REVLIO
Revlio is technology that makes the world shoppable, and is absolutely simple to use. It transforms and streamlines retail purchasing, discovery of new products and engagement for everyone. Revlio is a new way to crossover and merge the online and offline worlds of consumers, bringing ease and convenience to their mobile shopping experiences. With a growing list of clients in consumer product industries across the board, Revlio is looking forward to expanding its presence in marine and retail spaces through 2015 in beyond. http://www.Revlio.com
